titles.title: Lifespan Respite Care Reauthorization Act of 2025
Lifespan Respite Care Reauthorization Act of 2025
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the program relating to lifespan respite care, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
